# Crates that should be DEFER - testing various scenarios

# Deprecated/abandoned crates
rustc-serialize
regex_macros

# Low-download crates
rustc_version
num_cpus

# Simple utilities that might not meet auto-promotion criteria
env_logger
log
hex
base64

# Experimental/alpha crates  
async-trait
futures-util

# Crates with potential security concerns
memmap2
libc
